games.title: Skyblock 3D: Survival
games.description: Embark on a unique survival adventure on floating islands in a 3D world, where each island offers valuable resources. Explore vibrant landscapes, battle monsters to grow stronger, and trade with villagers for useful items. Build plantations and breed animals to ensure a steady supply of food and resources. The skies are full of islands, each one holding secrets and challenges. Survive, craft, battle, and thrive in this exciting world!
games.howToPlayText:
For computer:
- Move: W, A, S, D
- Jump: Spacebar
- Break blocks: Hold down LMB
- Place blocks: RMB / F
- Inventory: E
- Pause: Tab
- Help: J
- Drop: Q (Shift+Q Drop full slot)

For mobile devices:
- Move: Left Joystick
- Jump: Arrow icon button
- Break blocks: Hold down the sword icon button.
- Stack blocks: Hold down the cross icon button.
- Inventory: Orange button in the middle of the screen.
- Pause: Purple button in the upper right corner of the screen

games.title: Trap Craft
games.description:
The Hacker is ready to fulfill any desire of a Princess, Noob, Pro, Herobrine and the rest.
He offers them to play a game: if you protect the portal from zombies, then the wish will come true!
Each character has its own funny ending! Find out all of them!

Features of the game Trap craft. Herobrine and Noob vs Hacker

- 6 adventures: Herobrine, Princess, Noob, Pro, Foxy, Imp!
- 12 pets - tame all!
- This is a walkthrough game, not just a mod.
- The main characters have inventory for items
- Unique abilities of weapons
- Different types of monsters: from zombies to Dragons!
- At the levels you will meet Entity 303
- Play together with friendly pets, set traps and fight against the hostile zombies of the cube world.
- Watch video exhibitions - learn the history of Herobrine, Princess, Nubik.
- The best Trap Crafting adventure game - defeat zombies, survive, craft traps, tame pets in a cube world.

And also try our other monster school games!
games.howToPlayText: You need to build a defense of your chosen traps against zombies. By killing zombies, you get coins that you can use to set traps in the way of zombies. Control the hero with the keyboard and mouse.

games.title: Block Mine Fuse TNT
games.description: Block Mine Fuse TNT is an exhilarating adventure game where players take on the mission to liberate the world from the ominous presence of Herobrine and its eerie constructions. Step into this action-packed universe and unleash your full potential by upgrading and deploying TNT, rockets, and a myriad of explosive powers upon cubic settlements. Play online for free without the hassle of downloading, and dive into a world where destruction meets strategy, all within the comfort of your browser. With its seamless integration across platforms such as iOS, Android, and desktop, Block Mine Fuse TNT offers a dynamic experience for gamers on the go or at home.

games.title: Steve parkour in mine
games.description:
Jump, run, and donâ€™t fall! Help Steve navigate dangerous levels filled with traps, chasms, and true cubic madness.

The levels keep getting harder, and your reaction speed and jumping precision are your only hope.

This game is perfect for both beginners and those who consider themselves masters of parkour in virtual worlds.

Are you ready to show what Steve is capable of in the world of parkour?
games.howToPlayText: Use the WASD keys to control the character. Press the spacebar to jump. Use the mouse to control the camera.

games.title: Noob saves a girl: A Story
games.description: Join an exciting rescue adventure in "Noob Saves a Girl," a free online game. Take on the role of a passionate hero trying to save his love from a cunning villain. Enjoy thrilling battles and strategic challenges on your phone or computer in captivating settings.
games.howToPlayText:
Moving around on the computer using the mouse and keyboard.
Use the joystick to move around on mobile devices.
Defeat all the bosses!
